summary: Dogecoin Price Prediction: Can Doge Hit $1? Not Before AiDoge Raises $1 Million
title: Dogecoin Price Prediction: Can Doge Hit $1? Not Before AiDoge Raises $1 Million
content: Dogecoin price rejection from highs around $0.0952 could spell doom for investors this week unless support at $0.075 remains intact. The largest meme coin, boasting nearly $ 11 billion in market capitalization is trading at $0.0786, down 3% on Monday.
Elon Musk’s most beloved cryptocurrency is up 18% this year alone, although it is worth mentioning that DOGE hit highs slightly above $0.1 early last month.

As the value of the meme continues to surge, investors are becoming more interested in whether it will ever reach the $1 milestone. Nevertheless, industry experts advise caution, as it may take some time to achieve this goal.
Although Dogecoin has generated a considerable amount of buzz, the chances of it reaching $1 anytime soon are uncertain, with experts offering divergent opinions on the matter.
While some analysts anticipate that social media hype and the connection to Elon Musk could push the currency’s price to $1 in the future, others are more skeptical.
That said, Despite the recent excitement surrounding Dogecoin, it faces an uphill task to hit the $1 benchmark.

Its lack of real-world applications and utility, combined with an inflationary supply and inability to generate its own price appreciation, make it improbable for the currency to achieve the approximately 1,100% increase required to reach $1.
One of the reasons why many analysts hesitate to predict significant future gains for Dogecoin is its lack of utility and purpose outside of being a means of exchange or a store of value.

The cryptocurrency was created as a joke and, despite its enthusiastic following, it is not widely used as a payment method. Also, its high volatility and lack of regulatory oversight in the larger cryptocurrency market make it a risky investment for many people.

Despite the obvious lack of utility, Dogecoin commands a massive following on different social media platforms, with Twitter leading with 3.7 million. According to a recent tweet by the project, Dogecoin is still decentralized, open source, and is not controlled by a single entity.

Unlike projects like XRP which are struggling to prove they are not securities, DOGE like Bitcoin is undisputedly a cryptocurrency. Dogecoin attracts investors for being affordable compared to BTC which is trading at $28,500 and Ethereum at $1,845.

Dogecoin price is trading at $0.07856 as bulls rush to defend support at $0.075. The meme token is holding below all the major moving averages, including the 50-day Exponential Moving Average (EMA), the 100-day EMA, and the 200-day EMA.

Â If Dogecoin price rebounds from support at $0.075 bulls will have another chance to push for gains above $0.1. Investors waiting for an opportunity for new buy entries should consider closely monitoring the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD), as it may send a buy signal in the coming sessions.

The call to buy DOGE would manifest with the MACD line in blue flipping above the signal line in red. Also, the MACD will change direction above the mean line at 0.00 suggesting that buyers have the upper hand.
If support at $ 0.075 fails to hold, Dogecoin would be in grave danger of dropping to test the demand area as highlighted by the gray band on the chart around $0.065.
Buy Dogecoin Now.
